text: Patients with a positive bacterial BAL - culture , had a significantly higher TTC ( median 1893 . 5 / mm 3 , IQR 829 . 7 / mm 3 - 3479 . 5 / mm 3 versus 787 . 0 / mm 3 , IQR 283 . 5 / mm 3 - 1439 . 5 / mm 3 ; p = 0 . 023 ) compared to patients with a negative BAL - culture . Cytology of BAL - fluid differed significantly between patients with NTHi isolated from BAL and patients with a negative BAL - culture ( Table 3 ) .
